questions.question: Our trusted, multitenant cloud means you get:
options: The benefits of the same core set of features for all customers
No software to install to access Salesforce

questions.question: The Salesforce API is:
options: Like a contract between two pieces of software, allowing them to connect and exchange information
Not available for certain technologies such as wearables
The exact same thing as an API name

questions.question: Metadata refers to:
options: Everything in your Salesforce org, including your customer and user data
A representation of your standard functionality, without customizations
